title: Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360 vs Lenovo Yoga 9i: Whatâ€™s the best convertible?
content:
Samsung recently introduced the Galaxy Book 2 Pro series, including the Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360 convertible. Like its predecessor, this is looking to be one of the best lightweight laptops around, especially if you want a convertible. Lenovo also recently announced the Yoga 9i Gen 7, another great convertible with a lot to offer.

The post Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360 vs Lenovo Yoga 9i: What’s the best convertible? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360 and Lenovo Yoga 9i are two spectacular convertibles with Intel 12th-gen CPUs, but they're quite different.
